verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Baba yetu,
Baba yetu uliye mbinguni. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jina lako litukuzwe,
ufalme wako ufike.
Utakalo lifanyike,
duniani kama mbinguni.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tupe leo riziki zetu,
riziki za kila siku.
Tusamehe makosa yetu,
kama tunavyowasamehe,
nasi waliotukosea.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Situtie majaribuni,
walakini utuopoe.
Tuopoe maovuni,
tuopoe maovuni.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Kwa kuwa falme,
ufalme ni wako.
Na nguvu,
utukufu milele
utukufu milele,
utukufu milele.
